title: Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott handling co-parenting 'really well'
text:
Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott handling co-parenting ‘really well’ (Picture: Getty Images)

Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott decided to call things off earlier this month, however that hasn’t stopped either of them from being in their daughter Stormi’s life.

Following their split, the beauty mogul confirmed they were putting their one-year-old first when hitting back at rumours on Twitter.

And it seems as though their plans to co-parent are still going strong, as a source revealed to Entertainment Tonight that the former couple are doing just fine.

They told the publication: ‘They were still on a break but are great at co-parenting Stormi.

‘Since Travis has some shows and is traveling, Kylie has Stormi more [often], but Travis is always in touch with her when he’s on the road.’

The duo split earlier this month (Picture: FilmMagic)

The insider added: ‘Kylie and Travis are both young, but they are very mature and have been handling parenting post breakup really well.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘Kylie and Travis don’t want any drama, and are on the same page of keeping Stormi happy.’

The proud dad appears to be enjoying time with his tot as he recently shared an iconic father daughter snap on Instagram.

‘Stormi is like a battery. I’ve gotten so much energy from her,’ he told his followers: ‘She has shown me so many things that I never understood. I only got it once she was here.’

Travis appears to be enjoying fatherhood (Picture: Instagram/@kyliejenner)

The 28-year-old added: ‘Fatherhood is the most impactful thing in my life.’

It’s claimed that the A-listers decided to part ways after Kylie announced she wanted more children.

A source told People: ‘There were several issues that made them decide to take a break. Kylie is all about family life and really wants a second baby.

‘She still has trust issues with Travis. He hasn’t been giving her the commitment that she needs. Travis isn’t ready to give her all that she wants.’

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star went onto confirm she plans to grow her brood, over on Instagram.

During a Q&A, the billionaire said to her fans: ‘I can’t wait to have more babies, but not ready just yet.’

description: Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott handling co-parenting 'really well' following split.
